description:
TL-DR: don't waste your time, it's awful. 1 star because I can't give it zero, or the negative 5 it deserves.

I installed TextEdit because I was frustrated with "Kate" not giving me a simple way to NOT use tabs when I create a new document, but this is garbage. The UI looks like it was coded in the mid-90's and the menu floats free/independent of the actual text pane. I didn't even use it. Opened it and tried to drag the menu into a more convenient location, only for the text pane to lose focus to every other window I had open and disappear behind them all. Nope. Buh-bye.

I uninstalled and only then realized I needed to have the program installed to be able to leave a review - I get it, but still lame - so I RE-installed it just to be able to say "This progam is garbage", and I will now immediately uninstall it again. Seriously, just don't.
Really difficult interface. Extremely small. Program could not locate my files in their folder.
summary: worst text editor I have ever used

description: Interface is not usefull
Reminded me of Windows 3.11
I agree with others, reminds you of 30 years ago
Useless, cant even acces my files.
very flop app not recommended to download
summary: very flop app not recommended to download

description: Unusable on Ubu-Mate 20.04LTS because it doesn't show in app list and the UI text is too small on 1080p display. The capabilities are fine for a very simple text editor you can just use w/o futzing with settings to get rid of line numbering, etc. Kate or Pluma are fine for that, and for programming well... you know what you like.
GVim is hell to use and this is a godsend by comparison. It isn't perfect, but it's actually intuitive to use compared to that garbage mess.
summary: Not perfect, but SO MUCH BETTER than GVim

description:
very bad app I don't recommend it
and I don't know how to delete it
summary: very bad app I don't recommend it

description: not recommended
so bad, this is like UI nightmare
the design is so awful.

I installed and immediately concluded it won't work for me. Cannot change the window default size... it has the option in Preferences but doesn't work, etc. Then I tried unchecking "installed", but in Software tells me cannot remove it because cannot find file. In terminal - same thing! Only whereis finds it as TextEdit but when I try to purge or remove it, it complains cannot find it???? What is this? I want it gone!
Die app scheint noch aus mac os9 zu stammen. Ist so nicht nutzbar.
Hatte einen simplen editor erwartet aber ich wurde überwältigt von der UI, plötzlich befand ich mich irgendwie im jahre 2000.

Esperaba encontrar algo remotamente similar a cómo era la app de Apple de idéntico nombre hace 15 años. A ver si se ponen las pilas porque para vencer al software privativo hay que ofrecer herramientas similares y no todo se reduce a abrir siempre una pesada aplicación de ofimática.
summary: A día de hoy (2021) es inusable en PureOS

description: error fatal au démarrage

summary: Программа не делает того, чего обещано
